title: Provided further that, this ancillary area FSI shall be applicable to all other schemes like TOD, PMAY, ITP, IT, MHADA, etc
clause_text: Provided further that, this ancillary area FSI shall be applicable to all other schemes like TOD, PMAY, ITP, IT, MHADA, etc. except (1) Rehabilitation component in SRA. In the result, free of FSI items in the said schemes, if any, other than mentioned in UDCPR, shall stand deleted.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
